title: Parameters for Ndt Scan Matcher Node

method.description: The method to estimate the initial pose. 0:RANDOM_SEARCH, 1:GRID_SEARCH

particles_num.description: The number of particles to estimate initial pose.

n_startup_trials.description: The number of initial random trials in the TPE (Tree-Structured Parzen Estimator). This value should be equal to or less than 'initial_estimate_particles_num' and more than 0. If it is equal to 'initial_estimate_particles_num', the search will be the same as a full random search.

grid_num_x.description: The number of grid search in x-axis.

grid_num_y.description: The number of grid search in y-axis.

grid_num_z.description: The number of grid search in z-axis.

grid_num_roll.description: The number of grid search in roll-axis.

grid_num_pitch.description: The number of grid search in pitch-axis.

grid_num_yaw.description: The number of grid search in yaw-axis.

grid_search_range_x.description: The range of grid search in x-axis. [m]

grid_search_range_y.description: The range of grid search in y-axis. [m]

grid_search_range_z.description: The range of grid search in z-axis. [m]

grid_search_range_roll.description: The range of grid search in roll-axis. [rad]

grid_search_range_pitch.description: The range of grid search in pitch-axis. [rad]

grid_search_range_yaw.description: The range of grid search in yaw-axis. [rad]
